channel.title: title error
channel.description: when im playing the game and i hit the steam overlay button the game is called source sdk 2007 instead of black mesa is this an error

item.title: title error
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
No, that’s standard for all mods. Steam doesn’t actually run the mod, but the Source SDK Base, so that’s what Steam sees/shows.

Read full topic
